author: gnodet
msg: [KARAF-327] Add a property to control the framework factory in case multiples ones are available in the classloader, do the call to framework.stop() in a new thread to avoid blocking (even though the shutdown itself does not block, felix waits for a lock and that can take some time), also report the error if a timeout occurs using the wrapper
